    }                                       

    private void textBoxName1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                             
        
    }

    }                                    

    private void rdoSingleActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                          
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                         

    private void btnOKActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                      
       
        
        
        
        
       //name and age 
        
    String name1 = textBoxName1.getText();
        try{
       
         if (textBoxName1.getText().length() <8) {
             JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this,
                    "Name must be between 8 - 30 chracters long!",
                    "Input",
                    JOptionPane.OK_OPTION);
             
              }
         
        }catch(HeadlessException e){
            
        }
        
        int age1 = 0;
        
        try{
            age1 = Integer.parseInt(textBoxAge1.getText());
            
        }catch(NumberFormatException e){
            
        }
        
        
        
        double basicCost = 0;
       
        // basic costs single trip, mult trip, backpack trip 
       if (rdoSingle.isSelected()==true){
           basicCost = 100;
       } else if (rdoSingle1.isSelected()== true){
          basicCost = 150; 
       }else if (rdoSingle2.isSelected()== true){
           basicCost = 175;
       }
        
        
        //area charge uk, europe & worldwide
       double areaCharge=0;
       if (locationUk1.isSelected()== true){
           areaCharge = 0;
       }else if (locationEurope2.isSelected()== true){
           areaCharge = basicCost * 0.25;
       }else if (locationWW3.isSelected()== true){
           areaCharge = basicCost * 0.50;
       }
       
       
       //length charge weekly
       double lengthCharge=0;
       if (cmbDays.getSelectedIndex()==0){
           //error 
       }else if (cmbDays.getSelectedIndex()==1){
           lengthCharge = 15;
       }else if (cmbDays.getSelectedIndex()==2){
           lengthCharge = 20;
       }else if (cmbDays.getSelectedIndex()==3){
           lengthCharge = 25;
       }else if (cmbDays.getSelectedIndex()==4){
           lengthCharge = 30;
       }
       
        
       //medicalCost with conditions 
       double medCharge=0;
       
     
       if (radioMed1.isSelected()== true){
          
           if (cmbMedical.getSelectedIndex() ==0){
            medCharge = basicCost * 0.15;   
           }
                if (cmbMedical.getSelectedIndex() ==1){
                 medCharge = basicCost * 0.10;                
           }
                    if (cmbMedical.getSelectedIndex() ==2){
                     medCharge = basicCost * 0.10;   
           }
                        if (cmbMedical.getSelectedIndex() ==3){
                         medCharge = basicCost * 0.20;   
           }
                            if (cmbMedical.getSelectedIndex() ==4){
                             medCharge = basicCost * 0.25;   
           }
       }else if (radioMed2.isSelected()== true){
        medCharge = 0;
        
    }
       
        //discount for cover type, location, medical condition & length charge
       double discount =0;
       if (disExcess1.getSelectedIndex()==0){
          discount = 0; 
       }else if (disExcess1.getSelectedIndex()==1){
           discount = basicCost*0.05; 
       }else if (disExcess1.getSelectedIndex()==2){
           discount = basicCost*0.10; 
       }else if (disExcess1.getSelectedIndex()==3){
           discount = basicCost*0.15; 
       }
      
       
 double cruiseCharge=0;
       if (cruiseCover1.isSelected()== true){
           cruiseCharge = 50 ;
           
       }else if (cruiseCover2.isSelected()== true){
           cruiseCharge = 0;
       }



//cruiseCost added serpertely to total cost 
       double  totalCost  = basicCost + lengthCharge + areaCharge + medCharge + cruiseCharge - discount;
       
      
       
        
        //puting information onto a new form
       
       
       ResultForm result = new ResultForm();
       
       // labels: total vaule
       result.lblTotalCost.setText(Double.toString(totalCost));
       
       result.setVisible(true);
       
       // basic cost 
       
       result.lblCover2.setText(Double.toString(basicCost));
       
       result.setVisible(true);
       
       // area charge
       
       result.lblArea2.setText(Double.toString(areaCharge));
       
       result.setVisible(true);
       
       //length charge 
       
       result.lblLength2.setText(Double.toString(lengthCharge));
       
       result.setVisible(true);
       
       // medical conditions
      
       result.lblMed2.setText(Double.toString(medCharge));
       
       result.setVisible(true);
       
       // cruise cover
       result.lblCruise2.setText(Double.toString(cruiseCharge));
       
       result.setVisible(true);
       
       //excess discount 
       
       result.lblExcess2.setText(Double.toString(discount));
       
       result.setVisible(true);
       
       //userName text box
      
       result.name2.setText(name1);
       
       result.setVisible(true);
       
       
       
       
       
       //age textbox 
       
       
       result.age2.setText(Integer.toString(age1));
       
       result.setVisible(true);
      
       
       
    }                                     

    private void radioMed2ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                          
        cmbMedical.setEnabled(false);
    }                                         

    /**
     * @param args the command line arguments
     */
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        /* Set the Nimbus look and feel */
        //<editor-fold defaultstate="collapsed" desc=" Look and feel setting code (optional) ">
        /* If Nimbus (introduced in Java SE 6) is not available, stay with the default look and feel.
         * For details see http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/uiswing/lookandfeel/plaf.html 
         */
        try {
            for (javax.swing.UIManager.LookAndFeelInfo info : javax.swing.UIManager.getInstalledLookAndFeels()) {
                if ("Nimbus".equals(info.getName())) {
                    javax.swing.UIManager.setLookAndFeel(info.getClassName());
                    break;
                }
            }
        } catch (ClassNotFoundException ex) {
            java.util.logging.Logger.getLogger(Travel_Insurance_form.class.getName()).log(java.util.logging.Level.SEVERE, null, ex);
        } catch (InstantiationException ex) {
            java.util.logging.Logger.getLogger(Travel_Insurance_form.class.getName()).log(java.util.logging.Level.SEVERE, null, ex);
        } catch (IllegalAccessException ex) {
            java.util.logging.Logger.getLogger(Travel_Insurance_form.class.getName()).log(java.util.logging.Level.SEVERE, null, ex);
        } catch (javax.swing.UnsupportedLookAndFeelException ex) {
            java.util.logging.Logger.getLogger(Travel_Insurance_form.class.getName()).log(java.util.logging.Level.SEVERE, null, ex);
        }
        //</editor-fold>

        /* Create and display the form */
        java.awt.EventQueue.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
            public void run() {
                new Travel_Insurance_form().setVisible(true);
            }
        });
    }
